movies.title: Op hoop van zegen
movies.plot: Young Barend is worried about the safety of the sailing vessel he is on. The owner is an unscrupulous and stingy man who skimps on repairs and Barend becomes aware of this. Inevitably there is drama and tragedy. The film is set in an early 20th century Dutch fishing village with local period costume and colour.
movies.simplePlot: Young Barend is worried about the safety of the sailing vessel he is on. The owner is an unscrupulous and stingy man who skimps on repairs and Barend becomes aware of this. Inevitably there...

biography.bio: Kitty Courbois was born on July 30, 1937 in Nijmegen, Gelderland, Netherlands as Catharina Anna Petronella Antonia Courbois. She is known for her work on Spijkerhoek (1989), Dokter Tinus (2012) and La chair et le sang (1985). She died on March 11, 2017 in Amsterdam, Noord-Holland, Netherlands.
biography.name: Kitty Courbois

biography.bio: After starring in Ciske the Rat (1984) and Op hoop van zegen (1986), Danny started a carreer as a singer of Dutch medium quality songs. Only after a few years did he grow to be the talented and very successful musicalstar he is now, starring in musicals like "Les Misrables"
biography.name: Danny de Munk

biography.bio: Renée Soutendijk was born on May 21, 1957 in The Hague, Zuid-Holland, Netherlands as Renette Pauline Soutendijk. She is an actress, known for Moordvrouw (2012), The 4th Man (1983) and Out of Order (1984). She is married to Thed Lenssen. They have two children.
biography.name: Renée Soutendijk

biography.bio: Huub Stapel was born on December 2, 1954 in Tegelen, Limburg, Netherlands as Hubertus Wijnandus Jozef Marie Stapel. He is an actor, known for Paradis express (1997), Amsterdamned (1988) and The Lift (1983). He has been married to Resie Jansen since December 2, 2004. They have two children.
biography.name: Huub Stapel

biography.bio: Rijk de Gooyer was born on December 17, 1925 in Utrecht, Utrecht, Netherlands. He was an actor, known for In voor- en tegenspoed (1991), Nosferatu the Vampyre (1979) and De Brekers (1985). He was married to Tonny Domburg. He died on November 2, 2011 in Amsterdam, Noord-Holland, Netherlands.
biography.name: Rijk de Gooyer

biography.bio: Willeke van Ammelrooy was born on April 5, 1944 in Amsterdam, Noord-Holland, Netherlands as Willy Geertje van Ammelrooij. She is an actress and director, known for The Lake House (2006), Antonia's Line (1995) and The Lift (1983). She has been married to Marco Bakker since November 20, 1989.
biography.name: Willeke van Ammelrooy

biography.bio: Tamar van den Dop was born on February 8, 1970 in Amsterdam, Noord-Holland, Netherlands. She is an actress and director, known for Karakter (1997), Supernova (2014) and Wolfsbergen (2007).
biography.name: Tamar van den Dop

biography.bio: Lex Goudsmit was born on March 15, 1913 in Brussels, Belgium. He was an actor, known for Flip de tovenaarsleerling (1961), Left Luggage (1998) and Peter en de vliegende autobus (1976). He died on December 10, 1999 in Amsterdam, Noord-Holland, Netherlands.
biography.name: Lex Goudsmit

biography.bio: Albert Mol was born on January 3, 1917 in Amsterdam, Noord-Holland, Netherlands. He was an actor and writer, known for The M.P. Case (1960), Fanfare (1958) and Dear Boys (1980). He was married to Lucy Bor. He died on March 9, 2004 in Laren, Gelderland, Netherlands.
biography.name: Albert Mol

biography.bio: Ramses Shaffy was born on August 29, 1933 in Neuilly-sur-Seine, Hauts-de-Seine, France. He was an actor, known for Confessions of Loving Couples (1967), Nitwits (1987) and Soubrette (1964). He died on December 1, 2009 in Amsterdam, Noord-Holland, Netherlands.
biography.name: Ramses Shaffy

biography.bio: Dorijn Curvers was born on January 10, 1961 in Nieuwer-Amstel, Noord-Holland, Netherlands as Dorijn Aster Curvers. She is an actress, known for The Hes Case (1982), The Storm (2009) and Op hoop van zegen (1986).
biography.name: Dorijn Curvers

biography.bio: Leen Jongewaard was born on May 30, 1927 in Amsterdam, Noord-Holland, Netherlands as Leendert Jongewaard. He was an actor, known for Flip de tovenaarsleerling (1961), Ja zuster, nee zuster (1966) and Citroentje met suiker (1972). He died on June 4, 1996 in Nice, Alpes-Maritimes, France.
biography.name: Leen Jongewaard

biography.bio: Ellen Veger was born on September 1, 1945 in 's-Hertogenbosch, Noord-Brabant, Netherlands. She is an actress, known for Op hoop van zegen (1986), Moord in extase (1984) and Wat u maar wilt (1970).
biography.name: Ellen Veger

biography.bio: Luc Lutz was born on November 17, 1924 in Delft, Zuid-Holland, Netherlands. He was an actor and writer, known for Ha die Pa! (1990), Olivier et le dragon vert (1983) and Hou jij nou van mij of ik van jou? (1977). He was married to Bela Brandon and Simone Rooskens. He died on November 16, 2001 in Rotterdam, Zuid-Holland.
biography.name: Luc Lutz

biography.bio: Vaassen is an actor, known for Op hoop van zegen (1986).
biography.name: Vaassen

filmingLocations.location: Pinewood Studios, Iver Heath, Buckinghamshire, England, UK
